amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the International Trade Commission by $2 million to provide legal and technical assistance to small businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease DOJ's General administration's account by $2,000,000 and increase the International Trade Commission salaries and expenses account by $2,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. McKinley.
